ThingDef.label: stonecutter's block
ThingDef.description: A place for bashing stones to each other. Production here is slow because of the lack of tools.

ThingDef.label: butcher's block
ThingDef.description: A wooden stump for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.

ThingDef.label: well
ThingDef.description: A small fortified hole dug through the ground to gain access to water.

ThingDef.label: rustic oven
ThingDef.description: A cooking table with a stone oven designed for baking meals.

ThingDef.label: large oven
ThingDef.description: A cooking table with a stone oven designed for baking meals.

ThingDef.label: grill
ThingDef.description: A wood fueled grill used for cooking meals with an open fire.

ThingDef.label: soup pot
ThingDef.description: A large metal cauldron that can cook delicious soups.

ThingDef.label: millstone
ThingDef.description: A small round stone for grinding raw plants.

ThingDef.label: trestle
ThingDef.description: A simple platform to saw raw wood into planks.

ThingDef.label: table saw
ThingDef.description: A table saw for turning logs into planks.

ThingDef.label: workbench
ThingDef.description: A work table equipped with tools for crafting and designing items.

ThingDef.label: jewelry bench
ThingDef.description: A work table equipped with tools for crafting and designing items.

ThingDef.label: cleaning bench
ThingDef.description: A table to clean loot and ready them for display.

ThingDef.label: alchemy workbench
ThingDef.description: A heavy table, secured with a layer of thick leather. Stocked with all sorts of thingamajigs, it’s useless to uneducated mind whilst perfectly functional for an adept of forbidden arts. It’s everything an aspiring alchemist could wish for to mix ingredients and prepare oddly specific reagents.

ThingDef.label: book scribe table
ThingDef.description: A wooden table equipped with inkwells, quills, and parchment, designed for writing manuscripts and scrolls.

ThingDef.label: advanced research bench
ThingDef.description: Greater technology requires greater minds, and thus, the simple research bench must upgraded to suit the needs of innovative inventors and accomplished researchers. From engineering to alchemy, the advanced research bench allows a colony to propel its technology into a new era of advanced warfare and medicine.

ThingDef.label: spinning wheel
ThingDef.description: A rolling contraption that processes raw cotton into fabrics.

ThingDef.label: furnace
ThingDef.description: A large stone furnace used to smelt raw ores and refine resources.

ThingDef.label: anvil
ThingDef.description: A large metalworking tool with a flattened top surface to strike objects on such as weapons and armor.

ThingDef.label: mine shaft
ThingDef.description: A sturdy platform equipped with a primitive elevator built on top of a vertical tunnel. Can be used for mining resources and chunks.

ThingDef.label: apiary
ThingDef.description: A wooden enclosure to host bees that produces honey and wax.

ThingDef.label: slop pot
ThingDef.description: A gruel pot blending flavors from generations past into a timeless culinary adventure.

ThingDef.label: ragout pot
ThingDef.description: A ragout pot blending flavors from generations past into a timeless culinary adventure.

ThingDef.label: fondue pot
ThingDef.description: A fondue pot blending flavors from generations past into a timeless culinary adventure.

ThingDef.label: mending bench
ThingDef.description: A workbench for repairing clothes, armor, and weapons.
